subject.normal: [JIRA] Created: (GLASSFISH-16383) asadmin set property to "" is not working properly

headers.subject: [JIRA] Created: (GLASSFISH-16383) asadmin set property to "" is not working properly
headers.received: by mail01.java.net (Postfix, from userid 60005) id 586EF24DCBB; Mon, 18 Apr 2011 23:51:48 +0000 (GMT)

body.para: asadmin set property to "" is not working properly
Key: GLASSFISH-16383 URL: http://java.net/jira/browse/GLASSFISH-16383 Project: glassfish Issue Type: Bug Components: admin Reporter: Shing Wai Chan Assignee: Tom Mueller

Running the following command twice gives different results: asadmin set
configs.config.server-config.http-service.virtual-server.server.property.XXX=""

Running it the first time, we have the following in domain.xml: <virtual-server id="server" sso-enabled="false"
network-listeners="http-listener-1,http-listener-2"> <property name="XXX" value=""></property> </virtual-server>

Running it the second time, we have the following in domain.xml: <virtual-server id="server" sso-enabled="false"
network-listeners="http-listener-1,http-listener-2"></virtual-server>
If we run it again, then we will get the property XXX="" again.
